Package br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.inflect

Class ConjugatedItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.inflect.ConjugatedItem
  • public class ConjugatedItem
extends java.lang.Object

    A conjugated item in a ConjugationTable instance.

    Author:
    almir jr.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConjugatedItem​(Verb verb, EnumVerbPersons person, EnumVerbTenses tense, EnumVerbVoices voice, EnumVerbModes mode, EnumVerbDefiniteness definiteness)
      Creates a new instance of the conjugated form of the given verb.

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(VerbConjugationFilter... filters)

        Returns whether the conjugated form match every of the given conjugation filters.

        Example: conjugatedItem.matches(EnumVerbTenses.IMPERFECT, EnumVerbPersons.I) returns true if (and only if) conjugatedItem is both IMPERFECT and 1st person.

        Parameters:
        filters - List of any VerbConjugationFilter enumerated values
        Returns:
        true if the conjugated form matches ALL the given filters, false otherwise
